app.forms package

Submodules

app.forms.classification_form module

class app.forms.classification_form.ClassificationForm(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: FlaskForm

Form for selecting a model and an image and running a classification job. model: the model to use for classification image: the image to classify upload_file: the file to upload use_own_img: whether to use the uploaded file or not

Flask form which manage data on image transformation.
